pull.title: doc: Add release note for the deprecated totalFee option of bumpfee

issue.title: rpc: Deprecate totalfee argument in `bumpfee`
issue.body:
totalFee argument is of questionable use, and should be removed in favor of feerate-based features.

I first moved IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled because `bitcoin-wallet` doesn't link `libbitcoin_server`.

events.body:
Would it make sense to add the support for feeRate to the release notes as well? 
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16492
You can add a release note for the new option in your PR for now.

events.message: doc: Add release note for the deprecated totalFee option of bumpfee

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+Deprecated or removed RPCs
+--------------------------
+
+- The `totalFee` option of the `bumpfee` RPC has been deprecated and will be
+  removed in 0.20.  To continue using this option start with
+  `-deprecatedrpc=totalFee`.  See the `bumpfee` RPC help text for more details.
comments.body: This is not going to be backported, so might as well inline it into the main release notes right now.
